snippet.title: Death Mark Trailer (GamePlay)
snippet.description: A strange rumor is spreading in Tokyo’s H city - those who possess the Mark will die. Unexpectedly appearing on the body, a grotesque birthmark, the person who has the Mark will die from unknown causes. Deprived of your memories, you arrived at a mansion rumored to protect the bearers of the Mark. As the doors swing open, the countdown to death has already begun...
